typeProperties.script:
parameters{
	rootfolder as string ('mycontainer'),
	cdmfolder as string ('cdmfolder')
}
source(output(
		TransactionId as string,
		SalesChannelId as string,
		PurchasingChannelId as string,
		TransactionInitiatedTimestamp as string,
		TransactionCompletedTimestamp as string,
		TransactionAmount as string,
		TotalRetailPriceAmount as string,
		TotalAdjustmentAmount as string,
		CustomerId as string,
		CustomerAccountId as string,
		TransactionTypeId as string,
		MerchantId as string,
		IsoCurrencyCode as string,
		LoyaltyProgramId as string,
		LoyaltyAccountId as string,
		StoreId as string,
		PaymentCardId as string,
		PointOfSaleId as string,
		TransactionClassificationId as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: false,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	entity: 'Transaction',
	format: 'cdm',
	manifestType: 'manifest',
	manifestName: 'Transaction.cdm.json',
	entityPath: 'Transaction',
	local: true,
	folderPath: ($cdmfolder),
	fileSystem: ($rootfolder)) ~> source1
source1 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> sink1

parameters{
	rootfolder as string ('mycontainer'),
	cdmfolder as string ('cdmfolder')
}
source(output(
		TransactionId as string,
		SalesChannelId as string,
		PurchasingChannelId as string,
		TransactionInitiatedTimestamp as string,
		TransactionCompletedTimestamp as string,
		TransactionAmount as string,
		TotalRetailPriceAmount as string,
		TotalAdjustmentAmount as string,
		CustomerId as string,
		CustomerAccountId as string,
		TransactionTypeId as string,
		MerchantId as string,
		IsoCurrencyCode as string,
		LoyaltyProgramId as string,
		LoyaltyAccountId as string,
		StoreId as string,
		PaymentCardId as string,
		PointOfSaleId as string,
		TransactionClassificationId as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: false,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	entity: 'Transaction',
	format: 'cdm',
	manifestType: 'manifest',
	manifestName: 'Transaction.cdm.json',
	entityPath: 'Transaction',
	local: true,
	folderPath: ($cdmfolder),
	fileSystem: ($rootfolder)) ~> source1
source1 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> sink1

source(output(
		movie as integer,
		title as string,
		genres as string,
		year as integer,
		Rating as integer,
		RottenTomato as integer
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> newFile
source(output(
		movie as integer,
		title as string,
		genres as string,
		year as integer,
		Rating as integer,
		RottenTomato as integer
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> existingTable
newFile derive(fingerprint = sha2(256,columns())) ~> rowSignature
existingTable derive(fingerprint1 = sha2(256,columns())) ~> rowSignature1
rowSignature, rowSignature1 exists(fingerprint == fingerprint1,
	negate:true,
	broadcast: 'auto')~> Exists1
Exists1 sink(input(
		movie as integer,
		title as string,
		genres as string,
		year as integer,
		Rating as integer,
		RottenTomato as integer
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	format: 'table',
	mapColumn(
		movie,
		title,
		genres,
		year,
		Rating,
		RottenTomato
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	errorHandlingOption: 'stopOnFirstError') ~> sink1

source(output(
		movie as integer,
		title as string,
		genres as string,
		year as short,
		Rating as short,
		RottenTomato as short
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> source1
Filter1 derive(Rating = iif(year==1988,1,toInteger(Rating)),
		year = iif(year==1960,2021,toInteger(year))) ~> DerivedColumn1
DerivedColumn1 alterRow(updateIf(year==1988),
	insertIf(year==2021),
	deleteIf(year==1950)) ~> AlterRow1
source1 filter(year == 1988 || year == 1960 || year == 1950) ~> Filter1
AlterRow1 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	format: 'delta',
	fileSystem: 'mycontainer',
	folderPath: 'moviesdelta',
	mergeSchema: false,
	autoCompact: false,
	optimizedWrite: false,
	vacuum: 0,
	deletable:true,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:true,
	upsertable:false,
	keys:['movie','year'],
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> sink1

source(output(
		movie as integer,
		title as string,
		genres as string,
		year as short,
		Rating as short,
		RottenTomato as short
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	limit: 50) ~> source1
DerivedColumn1 filter(year == 1980) ~> Filter1
source1 derive(currentTime = '_'+regexReplace(toString(currentTimestamp()),'\\s| |\\.|-|:','')) ~> DerivedColumn1
source1 derive(releasedate = iif(year == 1980,'_'+toString(:local1)+right('0'+toString(toInteger((random(1)*12)+1)),2)+right('0'+toString(toInteger((random(2)*12)+1)),2),'_20200311'),
		local1 := year) ~> DerivedColumn2
Filter1 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	rowFolderUrlColumn:'currentTime',
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> sink1
DerivedColumn2 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	rowFolderUrlColumn:'releasedate',
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> sink2

sources.name: loans
sources.script:
source(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> loans

typeProperties.script:
section Section1;
shared loans = let
  AdfDoc = AzureStorage.BlobContents("https://makadf001.blob.core.windows.net/mycontainer/SampleData/loan.csv"),
  Csv = Csv.Document(AdfDoc, [Delimiter = ",", Encoding = TextEncoding.Utf8, QuoteStyle = QuoteStyle.Csv]),
  PromotedHeaders = Table.PromoteHeaders(Csv, [PromoteAllScalars = true])
in
  PromotedHeaders;
shared UserQuery = let
  Source = loans,
  #"Filtered rows" = Table.SelectRows(Source, each [term] = " 36 months"),
  #"Changed column type" = Table.TransformColumnTypes(#"Filtered rows", {{"id", Int64.Type}, {"member_id", Int64.Type}, {"loan_amnt", Int64.Type}, {"funded_amnt", Int64.Type}, {"funded_amnt_inv", Int64.Type}, {"term", type text}, {"int_rate", type number}, {"installment", type number}, {"grade", type text}, {"sub_grade", type text}, {"emp_title", type text}, {"emp_length", type text}, {"home_ownership", type text}, {"annual_inc", type number}, {"verification_status", type text}, {"issue_d", type date}, {"loan_status", type text}, {"pymnt_plan", type text}, {"url", type text}, {"desc", type text}, {"purpose", type text}, {"title", type text}, {"zip_code", type text}, {"addr_state", type text}, {"dti", type number}, {"delinq_2yrs", Int64.Type}, {"earliest_cr_line", type date}, {"inq_last_6mths", Int64.Type}, {"mths_since_last_delinq", Int64.Type}, {"mths_since_last_record", Int64.Type}, {"open_acc", Int64.Type}, {"pub_rec", Int64.Type}, {"revol_bal", Int64.Type}, {"revol_util", type number}, {"total_acc", Int64.Type}, {"initial_list_status", type text}, {"out_prncp", Int64.Type}, {"out_prncp_inv", Int64.Type}, {"total_pymnt", type number}, {"total_pymnt_inv", type number}, {"total_rec_prncp", type number}, {"total_rec_int", type number}, {"total_rec_late_fee", type number}, {"recoveries", type number}, {"collection_recovery_fee", type number}, {"last_pymnt_d", type date}, {"last_pymnt_amnt", type number}, {"next_pymnt_d", type text}, {"last_credit_pull_d", type date}, {"collections_12_mths_ex_med", Int64.Type}, {"mths_since_last_major_derog", type text}, {"policy_code", Int64.Type}, {"application_type", type text}, {"annual_inc_joint", type text}, {"dti_joint", type text}, {"verification_status_joint", type text}, {"acc_now_delinq", Int64.Type}, {"tot_coll_amt", type text}, {"tot_cur_bal", type text}, {"open_acc_6m", type text}, {"open_il_6m", type text}, {"open_il_12m", type text}, {"open_il_24m", type text}, {"mths_since_rcnt_il", type text}, {"total_bal_il", type text}, {"il_util", type text}, {"open_rv_12m", type text}, {"open_rv_24m", type text}, {"max_bal_bc", type text}, {"all_util", type text}, {"total_rev_hi_lim", type text}, {"inq_fi", type text}, {"total_cu_tl", type text}, {"inq_last_12m", type text}}),
  #"Uppercased text" = Table.TransformColumns(#"Changed column type", {{"verification_status", each Text.Upper(_), type text}, {"loan_status", each Text.Upper(_), type text}})
in
  #"Uppercased text";

source(output(
		movie as integer,
		title as string,
		genres as string,
		year as short,
		Rating as short,
		RottenTomato as short
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> MoviesCSVSource
MoviesCSVSource aggregate(groupBy(year),
	avgRatingForComedies = round(avgIf(instr(lower(genres),'comedy')>0,Rating),2)) ~> AvgComedyRatingByYear
MoviesCSVSource aggregate(groupBy(year),
	minRating = min(Rating),
		maxRating = max(Rating)) ~> minMaxRatingByYear
Filter1 derive(Favorite = true()) ~> Favorite
MoviesCSVSource filter(year == 1980) ~> Filter1
AvgComedyRatingByYear sort(desc(avgRatingForComedies, true)) ~> Sort1
Sort1 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> sink1AvgRatingByYear
minMaxRatingByYear sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> sink2MinMaxRating
Favorite sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	mapColumn(
		movie,
		title,
		genres,
		year,
		Rating,
		RottenTomato,
		Favorite
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> sink3Favorites

source(output(
		Date as date,
		Open as double,
		High as double,
		Low as double,
		Close as double,
		Volume as double,
		Dividend as double,
		Split as double,
		Adj_Open as double,
		Adj_High as double,
		Adj_Low as double,
		Adj_Close as double,
		Adj_Volume as double
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> StocksSource
Filter1 window(over(stocksymbol),
	asc(Date, true),
	startRowOffset: -7L,
	endRowOffset: 7L,
	FifteenDayMovingAvg = round(avg(Close),2)) ~> Window1
Window1 select(mapColumn(
		Date,
		Close,
		FifteenDayMovingAvg
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> Select1
StocksSource derive(stocksymbol = 'msft') ~> DerivedColumn1
DerivedColumn1 filter(High > 0) ~> Filter1
Select1 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	saveOrder: 1) ~> sink1

sources.name: moviesCSV
sources.script:
source(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	partitionBy('roundRobin', 20)) ~> moviesCSV

sources.name: SQLMovies
sources.script:
source(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> SQLMovies

sinks.name: Sink1
sinks.script:
sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	partitionFileNames:['mymovies.csv'],
	partitionBy('hash', 1),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> Sink1

typeProperties.script:
section Section1;
shared moviesCSV = let
  AdfDoc = AzureStorage.BlobContents("https://makadf001.blob.core.windows.net/mycontainer/SampleData/moviesDB.csv"),
  Csv = Csv.Document(AdfDoc, [Delimiter = ",", Encoding = TextEncoding.Utf8, QuoteStyle = QuoteStyle.Csv]),
  PromotedHeaders = Table.PromoteHeaders(Csv, [PromoteAllScalars = true])
in
  PromotedHeaders;
shared SQLMovies = let
  AdfDoc = Sql.Database("maksqldb.database.windows.net", "makaw"),
  InputTable = AdfDoc{[Schema = "dbo", Item = "Movies"]}[Data]
in
  InputTable;
shared UserQuery = let
  Source = moviesCSV,
  #"Filtered rows" = Table.SelectRows(Source, each [year] <> "-1980"),
  #"Removed columns" = Table.RemoveColumns(#"Filtered rows", {"RottenTomato"}),
  #"Changed column type" = Table.TransformColumnTypes(#"Removed columns", {{"movie", Int64.Type}}),
  #"Sorted rows" = Table.Sort(#"Changed column type", {{"movie", Order.Ascending}}),
  #"Merged queries" = Table.NestedJoin(#"Sorted rows", {"movie"}, SQLMovies, {"movie"}, "SQLMovies", JoinKind.LeftOuter),
  #"Changed column type 1" = Table.TransformColumnTypes(#"Merged queries", {{"title", type text}, {"genres", type text}, {"year", Int64.Type}, {"Rating", Int64.Type}}),
  #"Expanded SQLMovies" = Table.ExpandTableColumn(#"Changed column type 1", "SQLMovies", {"movie", "title", "genres", "year", "Rating", "RottenTomato"}, {"SQLMovies.movie", "SQLMovies.title", "SQLMovies.genres", "SQLMovies.year", "SQLMovies.Rating", "SQLMovies.RottenTomato"})
in
  #"Expanded SQLMovies";

sources.name: moviesCSV
sources.script:
source(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> moviesCSV

typeProperties.script:
section Section1;
shared moviesCSV = let
  AdfDoc = AzureStorage.BlobContents("https://makadf001.blob.core.windows.net/mycontainer/SampleData/moviesDB.csv"),
  Csv = Csv.Document(AdfDoc, [Delimiter = ",", Encoding = TextEncoding.Utf8, QuoteStyle = QuoteStyle.Csv]),
  PromotedHeaders = Table.PromoteHeaders(Csv, [PromoteAllScalars = true])
in
  PromotedHeaders;
shared UserQuery = let
  Source = moviesCSV
in
  Source;

sources.name: moviesCSV
sources.script:
source(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> moviesCSV

typeProperties.script:
section Section1;
shared moviesCSV = let
  AdfDoc = AzureStorage.BlobContents("https://makadf001.blob.core.windows.net/mycontainer/SampleData/moviesDB.csv"),
  Csv = Csv.Document(AdfDoc, [Delimiter = ",", Encoding = TextEncoding.Utf8, QuoteStyle = QuoteStyle.Csv]),
  PromotedHeaders = Table.PromoteHeaders(Csv, [PromoteAllScalars = true])
in
  PromotedHeaders;

in
